content:
CloudMediaContext CloudMediaContext Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Describes the context from which all entities in the Microsoft WindowsAzure Media Services platform can be accessed.
